class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 1 students only.
course_description: This course introduces students to the foundational principles of pathophysiology and pharmacology in nursing and will be the basis for the development of knowledge regarding human conditions and therapeutics associated with multiple disease conditions.
sections: Class Nbr: 5779, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Haynes Ferere/Csaky, Status: Open
